title: Pine Gap images
brief_description: A celebrations of documented images of the women’s protest camp at Pine Gap, Australian Northern Territory in November 1983. A series of images representing the feeling of some of the women acting for qualitative change and for world peace. A discussion starter about non-violent protest action.
